channel.title: Electromancer Rework(Forum of Lies)
channel.description: > # [color = "green"] The Electromancer [/color] > **[color = "green"] Neutral Killer [/color]** > **Static Shield (Passive)** - You are immune to death at night. > **Electic discharge (Day)** - Kill and Occupy all players tonight, that currently possess static, bypasses Death and Occupy Immunity.Will be cancelled if you aren't alive till the end of the night or you are jailed. You will be unable to use your night abilities tonight. - infinite uses > **A shocking discovery (Day)** - Select a player that contains static. you will learn their class at the start of the next night. - 2 uses > **Spark**(**Night**) - Apply a static charge to a player. > **Magnetic Field (Night)** - Discover who a player targets and who targets them, you will apply static to both(who visits your target and the players visited by your target) - 2-3 uses > *Kill all dem players*

item.title: Electromancer Rework(Forum of Lies)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Marcus_Doodalee:

you could make it a classical arsonist by making it so you cannot apply static whilst discharge is used

Just do this. Making it limited would mean he could end up unable to kill late game

Read full topic

item.title: Electromancer Rework(Forum of Lies)
item.dc:creator: Marcus_Doodalee
item.description:
Additionally you could make it a classical arsonist by making it so you cannot apply static whilst discharge is used

Read full topic

item.title: Electromancer Rework(Forum of Lies)
item.dc:creator: invoker
item.description:
true I should change it to only 2-3 uses

Why would you wait to use discharge?

item.title: Electromancer Rework(Forum of Lies)
item.dc:creator: invoker
item.description:
The Electromancer

Neutral Killer
Static Shield (Passive) - You are immune to death at night.
Electic discharge (Day) - Kill and Occupy all players tonight, that currently possess static, bypasses Death and Occupy Immunity.Will be cancelled if you arenâ€™t alive till the end of the night or you are jailed. You will be unable to use your night abilities tonight. - infinite uses
A shocking discovery (Day) - Select a player that contains static. you will learn their class at the start of the next night. - 2 uses
Spark(Night) - Apply a static charge to a player.
Magnetic Field (Night) - Discover who a player targets and who targets them, you will apply static to both(who visits your target and the players visited by your target) - 2-3 uses
Kill all dem players

Read full topic
